articles.description: ​Non-interest income, excluding treasury income, climbed 25 per cent YoY to Rs 4,629 crore from Rs 3,706crore. Fee income was up 32 per cent YoY at Rs 4,243 crore from Rs 3,219 crore. Fees from retail, rural, business banking and SME customers constituted abo…
articles.content:
ICICI Bank on Saturday reported a 50 per cent year-on-year (YoY) rise in profit after tax (PAT) at Rs 6,905 crore compared with Rs 4,616 crore in the same quarter last year.
The bank said its net in… [+2232 chars]

articles.title: Twitter blames Musk and weak ad revenue for Q2 decline - CGTN
articles.description: Twitter on Friday reported lower-than-expected revenue and a net loss for the second quarter, blaming its ongoing battle to close a takeover bid by Elon Musk and a weakening online advertising market

articles.title: Rakesh Jhunjhunwala Portfolio: Billionaire investor dumps 5 lakh shares in this housing finance firm - what... - Zee Business
articles.description: After stake reduction, Rakesh Jhunjhunwala holds 55,00,000 equity shares, aggregating to 1.17 per cent stakes in Indiabulls Housing Finance, as per the June quarter shareholding pattern.

articles.title: Google fires software engineer who claimed its AI chatbot is sentient - CGTN
articles.content:
